Troubleshooting, upgrading and maintaining Apple TV  All levels of users will find this guide full of useful information, whether you're a multimedia/High-Definition beginner who hasn’t invested a cent in hardware, or an intermediate-level enthusiast who already has an HDTV and surround sound system, or an advanced electronic wizard who needs just a quick reference tool to troubleshoot a problem.

All levels of users will find this guide full of useful information, whether you're a multimedia/High-Definition beginner who hasn’t invested a cent in hardware, or an intermediate-level enthusiast who already has an HDTV and surround sound system, or an advanced electronic wizard who needs just a quick reference tool to troubleshoot a problem.
description: From the Back Cover
Set up an Ethernet network within Mac OS X or Windows Vista!
Transform your living room into a digital entertainment center with this multimedia marvel Apple Remote

Are you ready to enjoy Apple TV? Whether you're a Mac or PC user, this fun, plain-English guide will have you streaming audio and video from your computer to your TV in no time. It's packed with tips and tricks for adding high definition and surround sound, importing and organizing photos, creating videos, ripping audio from CDs, working with playlists and podcasts, and much more!

About the Author
Mark L. Chambers
is an author, a tech editor, and an unabashed Mac fan. He is the author of more than 30 computer books, including
MacBook For Dummies
